body.name: LIKIMIO Full Size Bed Frame, Storage Headboard with Charging Station, Solid and Stable, Noise Free, No Box Spring Needed, Easy Assembly (Vintage and Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 3 hrs 9 mins
features: 【Storage Headboard with Charging Station】 2 Standard Plug Outlets & 2 USB Ports with Cable Management 5.9ft long power supply cord. Make charging and common small items such as phones, glasses, and books within easy reach.

【Sturdy and Stable】Heavy-duty metal slats reinforce the sturdiness and durability of the platform's full bed structure. Providing optimum support for all types of mattresses without the use of a box spring.
【Practical and Comfortable 2-in-1】Vintage shelf and black PU upholstered headboard combine practical and comfortable to match any style of the room. Full Bed Dimensions : L*W*H: 81.5 * 55.9 * 40.6"

【Save Space and Time】10.4" under-bed clearance provides extra storage space. Each part of the full platform bed is clearly labeled and numbered on each and you just need to match those numbers in order to assemble.
【Wide and Thick Leg Design】The bed legs are designed with unique angle iron, which is sturdy and beautiful, giving your bedroom a unique charm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and sturdy bed!
reviews.reviewText: So my kiddos were tired of bunk beds so I ordered 2 of these. They came within 3 days and no issues. Putting the bed together was fairly simple and finished putting it together within two hours. The frame is very sturdy and my kiddos are very happy. I thought the tan/white cloth on head board might look cheap but it doesnt at all, very pretty in person! Definitely a cute twin size bed for the price (twin fits both of my older children with plenty of room to grow). I would recommend! Only tip is to prepare for the space between frame and headboard, possibly order a thick mattress or add a topper to help with the space or even a quick idea is a thick body pillow. I would say atleast get a mattress with 8 or 12 and youll be good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bed was put together without issue and is sturdy. It looks nice and is an upgrade to the room. The only possible complaint is that the plug to make the electric chargers work is very short - unless you happen to have an outlet right by where you intend to put the headboard (as in on the same wall right next to or behind it).Would recommend and would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy & easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Great bed for the price and looks great too! Love the ledge with the plugs extremely convenient. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good product
reviews.reviewText: It’s very easy to build this frame even by yourself if you use the instructions!! The only problem I saw was that on the both sides of the bars on the pictures they got a plastic cover thats doesn’t fit correctly on the frame and when you use the force to put in where they supposed to go that plastic cover gets broken , Even so, I had to place those bars using a little force since those little covers does not allow them to be placed easily and you have to force causing the covers to break, even so the bars do their job.Thats why I don’t give 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Bed Frame ever!
reviews.reviewText: This thing is strong, functional and looks great! I recently upgraded from a Queen mattress to a KING. So I needed a new frame. Because of the larger bed, I no longer had room on the sides for a nightstand. This frame provided the perfect solution. A nice built in shelf on the headboard. A shelf that includes 2 power outlets and 2 USB ports! Talk about functional! This is the only bed frame I've ever owned that was useful for more than just sleeping on. The headboard shelf is actually my favorite part. It's just the right height to not cover up my wall switch and fits perfect where I had my old bed. The headboard shelf takes place of my old nightstand. So it's incredibly useful!!! The frame doesn't squeak either. It seems very strong. This bed frame is top quality! Look great and simply IS great! BUY BUY BUY!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Truly Excellent Bed Frame At This Price Point!
reviews.reviewText: You could spend a whole lot more on a bed frame and still not come close to the quality of this one. I was very impressed with the overall fit and finish of this frame. All the parts aligned properly for assembly, were well identified and the instructions were easy to follow. The structural materials were heavy duty and will undoubtedly hold more than the design weight. I had this fully assembled and in position in about an hour and a half. The instructions state to keep the assembly screws loose until all the parts are in place, then tighten them down...follow that advice and assembly will be a breeze. The dual 120VAC power outlet combined with the two USB outlets make this bed frame a clear winner that's both functional and aesthetically pleasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy, easy to build
reviews.reviewText: I don't leave hardly any reviews on Amazon, but I felt I had to review this one because I was really impressed by the quality of this bed frame. I think most of us have received some sort of 'assembly required' items, and usually I'm less than impressed with the instructions, fit and finish, durability, etc. I had the opposite experience with this bed frame. The frame itself is VERY solid once together. The materials and welds on the metal were solid. The instructions were easy to follow and all you need is the provided allen wrench. It took awhile to unwrap/unbox, but once I laid everything out, I had this all assembled in about 30-40 minutes. After throwing my bed down (king size), I was very happy with the height of the frame and just how sturdy and quiet it is. Highly recommend, great product for the price in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and looks good for my purpose
reviews.reviewText: Not to difficult to install and sturdy. No creeks even with activity. Really good value

El producto se siente y se ve de buena calidad. Es también atractiva y con ese aire industria que promete. El cargador USB carga un ipad, no es de los chicos. Solo le pongo 4 en resistencia porque no me imagino que la construcción atornillada pueda aguantar mucho peso, pero hasta ahora ha cumplido y no tiene ningún daño. Toma quizá unos 90 minutos armarla pero las instrucciones son claras y no se necesita más que los dos desarmadorcitos que incluye.
